features: Beautiful Area Rug—If you're looking for a room rug that looks quite beautiful, is durable and easy to care for, our brilliantly colored, beautifully patterned rugs are just what you're looking for. Featuring a unique faded style medallion and floral print pattern, this carpet can greatly enhance the beauty of your indoor area while fitting into any style of home decor

Premium Polyester Surface—Our bedroom rug is flat woven from high quality polyester fibers for lightweight durability, it's no pile but soft to the touch and won't harbor fur, hair, or dirt, making it perfect for high-traffic areas or pets to protect your floors

Non-Slip Backing—One of the features of the vintage rug is its non-slip backing, made of tens of thousands of rubber dots and synthetic felt, which provides the abstract rug with enough grip to prevent dangerous slips and falls, which is especially important for families with young children and the elderly

Widely Used Area Rug—Our 3x5 area rug is versatile, the retro rug for living room, bedroom, dining room, kitchen, entryway, balcony and other high-traffic areas providing effortless style even，it can also be used as a decor in your study, hearth area, custom room, home office, the abstract rug is the ideal choice for your home

Easy to Clean—The washable rug is machine washable and very easy to care. Use a broom or vacuum cleaner to remove dust or hair for daily care, if excess liquid remains or dirt on the surface of the rug or need to to be thoroughly clean, Machine wash with cold water on gentle cycle(not to add bleach)，air dry or dry on air-only cycle without heat

TIPS：When the area rugs arrive there will be some creases at the beginning, flatten them on the floor and walk around a few days, or roll the rug in the opposite direction and lay it flat for a while, the creases will disappear

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ST. BRIDGE Vintage Floral Medallion Area Rugs

Every part of the rug is well made Soft Polyester Surface Made of enhanced synthetic fibers, Our indoor area rugs are comfortable to the touch and more durable. A good choice for high-traffic areas. Non-Slip Backing Made of high quality non-slip TPR latex backing which can effectively keep the carpet in a stable position and will protects your family. Low Pile Design The low-pile design makes debris and dirt more visible, making the carpet easier to clean. Durable Edge Our washable rug has high-density stitched edges that make it stronger and more durable and can make area rugs last longer.
Previous page Next page 1 Living Room Rug 2 Bedroom Rug 3 Dining Room Rug 4 Home Decor 5 Home Office Rug

The Aesthetic Vintage Collection Rugs Are Suitable for Any Room in Your Home Our rugs are a classic vintage style that will create a warm and comfortable space for your family. Our rugs are available in a variety of sizes and colors to suit different room decor styles.

Lightweight Rugs Are Easier To Clean And Care For Clean up debris or dust from the rug with a broom or vacuum cleaner.Machine wash with cold water on gentle cycle when thorough cleaning is required.Air dry or dry on air-only cycle with out heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small area rug
reviews.reviewText: This rug is great for the purpose I needed. I needed something very thin that a door would swing over without any problem. The color is great. The area where I put it needed to be something that would not show dirt and it met my expectation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great light weight runner and it is perfect for my hallway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kinda thin, but I think I like it
reviews.reviewText: At first I was annoyed by how thin the rug was but now that its laid out and in use, its really grown on me. Its soft and squishier than I realized. Very happy with it. You dont need to iron it like the instructions say. Just lay it out. And yeah it doesnt slide around to much. Happy with the rug and will probably get more for other areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice enough but super thin and light, does not lay flat, even with double sided tape. Looks nice, but wouldn’t buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Idk what this is, but it's not an area rug
reviews.reviewText: I'm horrified by this. It's not a rug in any sense of the word. I would call it a huge bath mat, but it's not even that nice.It looks kind of like a sweatshirt printed on a no-slip backing. Idk how else to describe it.It's seriously awful.I only bought it to save my house from the mud my dog will inevitably track in through my mudroom this Fall, so whatever, I'll use it.If you are looking for something that even resembles a rug with any kind of pile, this is not it. It's honestly one of the cheapest looking things I've purchased from Amazon, and I feel like that's saying something. It's like rug from Wish that even they refused to sell full price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful rug, true to photos. Only downside is it’s still not laying flat after a week and it slides around on the hardwood. Will need to get a pad for it for that reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Slides around and won’t lay flat
reviews.reviewText: I guess expect what you pay for, it’s been laying out for over a week and it still is not flat although the directions do say to iron it which I will try but I don’t think you should HAVE to iron it, but it is so thin and lightweight. It slides all over the floor as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty. Easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: Nicer than I expected. I've washed it, and it comes out great! Colors are very pretty. Very pleased.
